TopicTitle: The One Thing That Makes Me Angry Playing This Game: Crew Not Saved When Leaving VAB and Returning

Articles.Content:
Why is it that when you leave the VAB, and come back, EVERYTHING is just as you left it, except one tiny thing they don't show on the screen anywhere unless you click the crew button...  oh look, ALL my choices have been saved EXCEPT ONE, all my crew have been replaced by solo Jeb...  and you know when you realize this?  When you are splashing down and go to EVA your scientist, and there's Jeb, all alone smiling up at you...  (ok maybe I have a too big monitor with too small resolution lol, is there a way to make the Kerbals' pics in the bottom right bigger but nothing else? lol)

Just seems like an oversight, is there ANY reason NOT to remember what crew you had selected?

Just my opinion thanks,

Beaver

Edited November 16, 2020 by The Beaver
Totally agree, and totally why I recommend Better Crew Assignment. With that, you usually don't even need to set the crew but if you do, it respects your choices and doesn't override them.
I agree also. I hate having to readd my  crew just cause I exited the VAB.
